title: Who Wants to Be a Thousandaire? (2011)
dot: digraph michael_larson{graph[rankdir=LR, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12];start[label="Michael Larson's Story" shape=rect style=filled fillcolor=lightblue];tv_setup[label="Larson sets up 12 TVs" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightgreen];press_your_luck[label="Michael discovers 'Press Your Luck'" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightyellow];strategy[label="Develops strategy: Safe spots #4 and #8" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightyellow];audition[label="Auditions for Press Your Luck" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightpink];big_board[label="Beats the Big Board" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightorange];huge_win[label="Wins $110,237 (record)" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightorange];aftermath[label="Aftermath: No rules broken, CBS reacts" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightgray];pyramid_scheme[label="Falls into pyramid scheme and fugitive status" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightcoral];cancer[label="Dies of throat cancer in 1999" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightgrey];folk_hero[label="Folk Hero to Some" shape=ellipse style=filled fillcolor=lightgreen];end[label="Michael Larson's Legacy" shape=rect style=filled fillcolor=lightblue];start->tv_setup[label="In search of opportunity"];tv_setup->press_your_luck[label="Discovers game show"];press_your_luck->strategy[label="Analyzes game mechanics"];strategy->audition[label="Auditions in 1984"];audition->big_board[label="First round: learns timing"];big_board->huge_win[label="Breaks the record"];huge_win->aftermath[label="Producers react, CBS issues restrictions"];aftermath->pyramid_scheme[label="Falls into fraud"];pyramid_scheme->cancer[label="Flees but gets caught"];cancer->folk_hero[label="Some admire his skill"];folk_hero->end[label="Legacy lives on"];node[style=filled, fontname="Helvetica"];edge[fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];}
